mapper.select: select a.artical_id,a.artical_title,a.artical_describe,a.artical_time,a.artical_collection,a.artical_imgUrl,a.artical_views,a.artical_state,u.user_nickname from artical_tab a,user_tab u where a.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY a.artical_time DESC

select a.artical_id,a.artical_title,a.artical_describe,a.artical_time,a.artical_collection,a.artical_imgUrl,a.artical_views,a.artical_state,u.user_nickname from artical_tab a,user_tab u where a.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY a.artical_time DESC limit #{0}, #{1};
select count(*) as count from artical_tab
select a.*,u.user_nickname from artical_tab a,user_tab u where a.user_id = u.user_id and artical_id=#{0}

select a.artical_id,a.artical_title,a.artical_describe,a.artical_time,a.artical_collection,a.artical_imgUrl,a.artical_views,a.artical_state,u.user_nickname from artical_tab a,user_tab u where a.user_id = u.user_id and a.artical_state=0 ORDER BY a.artical_time DESC limit #{0}, #{1};
